接口 FxAssetRepository

  • 所有超级接口:

    @Repository
public interface FxAssetRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<FxAsset,java.lang.String>

      • updateBalance

        @Modifying
 @Transactional(rollbackFor=java.lang.Exception.class)
 @Query(value="update FX_ASSET set ASSET_BALANCE = ?1 , VERSION = (?2 + 1) where VERSION = ?2 and CURRENCY_EN_NAME = ?3 and BANKCARD_ID = ?4",
       nativeQuery=true)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Integer version,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String currencyCode,
